samples.context: The process by which green plants prepare food is called photosynthesis. During this process; the solar energy is converted into chemical energy and carbohydrates are formed.

samples.context: Green leaves are the main sites of photosynthesis. During this process; the solar energy is converted into chemical energy and carbohydrates are formed.
